content: julie hart ~ byequalmeasure byequalmeasure julie hart byequalmeasure@outlook com 5/30/2017 black lace choker 2 00 mm hook knit pick curio crochet thread size 10 notes *before beginning leave a chain of 4 inches for tying on when completed likewise before fastening off chain 4 inches *this project will need to be blocked when finished * foundation chain is multiples of 4 +9 i chained 104+9=14inches black lace choker row 1 chain 104 for a total chain of 113 row 2 single_crochet in 9th chain from hook * ch5 sk3 single_crochet* repeat to end row 3 *ch5 picot in 3rd chain chain 3 single_crochet in 5ch-loop* repeat to end chain for inches for tying on fasten off you will need to block this choker i simply pinned it out and steamed it see picture please feel free to contact me on ravelry or etsy with any questions or concerns it has been an honor to serve you warm regards julie hart ~ byequalmeasure page 02
